00005 class Funcopt(app.Application):
00006     def __init__(self, params, random):
00007         app.Application.__init__(self, params, random)

00009 #-------------------------------------------#
00010     def fitness(self, ind):
00011         '''
00012         Compute fitness.
00013         '''
00014         data = self.decode(ind.genome)
00015         x, y = data['x'], data['y']
00016         ind.x, ind.y = x, y
00017 
00018         num = 1. + math.log(x**2. + 7*y**2. + 1.)
00019         denom = 1. + 3*x**2. + 2*y**2. - x*y + x
00020         ind.fitness = num/denom
00021 
00022 #-------------------------------------------#
00023     def report(self, pop, gen):
00024 
00025         best = max(pop)
00026         sumFit = reduce(lambda a,b: a + b.fitness, pop, 0)
00027             
00028         print '%i) Best Fit: %.2f - (%f, %f), Avg Fit: %.2f' % (gen, best.fitness, best.x, best.y, sumFit/len(pop))
